Module kivakit.core.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.vm

Class JavaVirtualMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.language.vm.JavaVirtualMachine
  • public class JavaVirtualMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    An object for working with a Java virtual machine, including getting properties, instrumentation and determining the rough size of objects.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  JavaVirtualMachine.KivaKitExcludeFromSizeOf
      Exclude a field or class from sizeOfObjectGraph() calculations
      static interface  JavaVirtualMachine.KivaKitExcludeFromSizeOfDebugTracing
      Exclude a field or class from sizeOfObjectGraph() debug tracing
      static interface  JavaVirtualMachine.KivaKitNonCyclicObjectGraph
      To mark objects passed to sizeOfObjectGraph() as not having cycles (for efficiency).

      • sizeOfObjectGraph

        public Bytes sizeOfObjectGraph​(java.lang.Object object,
                               java.lang.String prefix,
                               Bytes minimumSizeToDebugTrace)
        Computes the size of an object graph. To use this method, you must call instrument() or pass -javaagent:<project.jar> to the JVM. This will call the premain(String, Instrumentation) method above, which will enable the size measuring functionality in the JVM.
        Parameters:
        prefix - A prefix to name the object for display purposes
        minimumSizeToDebugTrace - The minimum size of an object to display it with trace. To show nothing when computing object size, call sizeOfObjectGraph(Object) instead of this method.
        Returns:
        The recursive size of the object using JVM instrumentation
